inn_note.name: a note
inn_note.description: A folded piece of parchment. It reads: 'Welcome, traveler. Please see me at the front desk when you are ready to settle your bill. - The Innkeeper'

lodging_tax_payment.name: a lodging tax payment
lodging_tax_payment.description: A sealed envelope addressed to the Town Clerk. It feels like it contains a few coins.

ore_requisition.name: an ore requisition
ore_requisition.description: A requisition form for iron ore, signed by the Town Clerk. It's addressed to the Armory.

leather_requisition.name: a leather requisition
leather_requisition.description: A requisition order for cured leather strapping, meant for the Furrier.

cured_sinew_bundle.name: a bundle of cured sinew
cured_sinew_bundle.description: A bundle of dried and cured sinew, bundled neatly.

salve_box.name: a box of salves
salve_box.description: A small box of healing salves, marked with the Apothecary's seal. It's addressed to the Temple.

patrol_notice.name: a patrol notice
patrol_notice.description: A list of patrol routes and times, to be delivered to the Guard Captain.

recruitment_poster.name: a recruitment poster
recruitment_poster.description: A poster calling for new members of the City Watch. It's meant for the Elementalist's Study.

overdue_books_request.name: a request for overdue books
overdue_books_request.description: A stiff note from the Elementalist, requesting the Librarian fetch his 'borrowed' books.

overdue_books.name: a stack of overdue books
overdue_books.description: A heavy stack of books on 'Illusory Set Design'. They belong to the Library.

bank_note.name: a bank note
bank_note.description: A crisp note from the Theatre Master, authorizing a withdrawal of 500 silvers.

final_receipt.name: a final receipt
final_receipt.description: A receipt stamped 'PAID' by the Banker. This should be returned to the Town Clerk.
